Class ZSlice


java.lang.Object

  zio.ZObject

      zio.ZSlice
Direct Known Subclasses:
ZCol, ZRow
public abstract class ZSlice
extends ZObject

Base class for slices (that is ZRows and ZCols).. One public method is inherited from ZObject but not is not likely to be useful here.
